  • Constructor Details

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(long ID, long time, float value, float size)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the transaction.
      time - The time the transaction is created.
      value - The value of the transaction in local currency.
      size - The size of the transaction in bytes

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(int ID, long time, float value, float size, int nodeID)
      Constructor
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the transaction.
      time - The time the transaction is created.
      value - The value of the transaction in local currency.
      size - The size of the transaction in bytes
      nodeID - The ID of the node where the transaction is supposed to show up. If undefined, please use constructor that omits this parameter.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction()
      Constructor. ID, time, value and size must be initialized with setters.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(long id)
      Constructor for given ID. Time, value and size must be initialized with setters.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the transaction.

  • Method Details

    • getNextTxID

      public static int getNextTxID()
      Get the next available ID number to assign to the transaction.
      Returns:
      The next transaction ID number

    • resetCurrID

      public static void resetCurrID()
      Resets the next available ID to 1. To be used for moving to the next experiment.

    • getCreationTime

      public long getCreationTime()
      Returns the simulation time the transaction was created.
      Returns:
      The simulation time the transaction was created.

    • getValue

      public float getValue()
      Returns the value of the transaction in the native currency.
      Returns:
      The value of the transaction in the native currency.

    • setValue

      public void setValue(float value)
      Sets the value of the transaction in the native currency.
      Parameters:
      value - The value of the transaction in the native currency.

    • setSize

      public void setSize(float size)
      Sets the size of the transaction in bytes.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the transaction in bytes.

    • getSize

      public float getSize()
      Gets the size of the transaction.
      Returns:
      The size of the transaction in bytes.

    • setID

      public void setID(long ID)
      Set the unique ID of the transaction.
      Parameters:
      ID - The ID of the transaction.

    • getID

      public long getID()
      Get the unique ID of the transaction.
      Returns:
      The unique ID of the transaction.

    • getType

      public Transaction.Type getType()
      Gets the transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE.
      Returns:
      The transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE.

    • setType

      public void setType(Transaction.Type type)
      Sets the transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE
      Parameters:
      type - The transaction type. One of HONEST, MALICIOUS or FAKE.

    • getNodeID

      public int getNodeID()
      The id of the node where the transaction first arrives
      Returns:
      The id of the node where the transaction first arrives. -1 if unspecified.

    • setNodeID

      public void setNodeID(int nodeID)
      Set the id of the node where the transaction first appears.
      Parameters:
      nodeID - The id of the node where the transaction first appers.
